mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_tran( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_tran t
AND t.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
AND t.customerId IN(SELECT id FROM tbl_customer WHERE name LIKE '%' #{customerName} '%')
AND t.stage LIKE '%' #{stage} '%'
AND t.type LIKE '%' #{type} '%'
AND owner IN (SELECT id FROM tbl_user u WHERE u.name LIKE '%' #{owner} '%')
AND t.contactsId IN(SELECT id FROM tbl_contacts WHERE fullname LIKE '%' #{contactsName} '%')
AND t.source LIKE '%' #{source} '%'

SELECT IFNULL(t.id,"") AS id ,IFNULL(t.name,"") AS name ,IFNULL(u.name,"") AS owner ,IFNULL(cu.name,"") AS customerId ,IFNULL(co.fullname,"") AS contactsId ,IFNULL(t.stage,"") AS stage ,IFNULL(t.type,"") AS type ,IFNULL(t.source,"") AS source FROM tbl_tran t LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON t.owner=u.id LEFT JOIN tbl_customer cu ON t.customerId=cu.id LEFT JOIN tbl_contacts co ON t.contactsId=co.id
AND t.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
AND cu.name LIKE '%' #{customerName} '%'
AND t.stage LIKE '%' #{stage} '%'
AND t.type LIKE '%' #{type} '%'
AND u.name LIKE '%' #{owner} '%'
AND co.fullname LIKE '%' #{contactsName} '%'
AND t.source LIKE '%' #{source} '%'
ORDER BY t.createTime DESC LIMIT #{skipCount},#{pageSize}

SELECT t.id ,IFNULL(u.name,"") AS owner ,t.money ,IFNULL(t.name,"") AS name ,t.expectedDate ,IFNULL(cu.name,"") AS customerId ,IFNULL(t.stage,"") AS stage ,IFNULL(t.type,"") AS type ,IFNULL(t.source,"") AS source ,a.name AS activityId ,IFNULL(co.fullname,"") AS contactsId ,uc.name AS createBy ,t.createTime ,IFNULL(uu.name,"") AS editBy ,IFNULL(t.editTime,"") AS editTime ,t.description ,t.contactSummary ,t.nextContactTime FROM tbl_tran t LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON t.owner=u.id LEFT JOIN tbl_customer cu ON t.customerId=cu.id LEFT JOIN tbl_contacts co ON t.contactsId=co.id LEFT JOIN tbl_activity a ON t.activityId=a.id LEFT JOIN tbl_user uc ON t.createBy=uc.id LEFT JOIN tbl_user uu ON t.editBy=uu.id WHERE t.id=#{id}
